thread.title: Richmond Mutumbami's 74 helps Zimbabwe take 2-1 series lead over Afghanistan
thread.title_full: Richmond Mutumbami's 74 helps Zimbabwe take 2-1 series lead over Afghanistan

title: Richmond Mutumbami's 74 helps Zimbabwe take 2-1 series lead over Afghanistan
text:
Richmond Mutumbami's 74 helps Zimbabwe take 2-1 series lead over Afghanistan 20 Oct 2015 15:17:00 
comments 
Richmond Mutumbami top scored as Zimbabwe took a 2-1 lead over Afghanistan with victory in the third one-day international at Bulawayo. 
The tourists posted 223 for eight batting first, the top three of Noor Ali Zadran (56), Mohammad Shahzad (30) and Mohammad Nabi (42) doing the bulk of the scoring. 
Mutumbami struck 74 in 92 balls at the top of the Zimbabwe innings but Afghanistan's bowling attack took the game to the wire, with just two deliveries left unbowled when Sikandar Raza settled matters with a decisive six off Dawlat Zadran. Related Sport News
